name: Words With Foes: Quest for the Lexinomicon
name_original: Words With Foes: Quest for the Lexinomicon
description:
Fight monsters, get loot, and defeat the biggest bosses around!

Type scrabble-approved words in order to defeat monsters and gain their letters. But watch out! They'll attack you back, making you lose those precious letters.

Keep your tray full, in this endless typing expedition into the depths!

NOTES:
- You can attack with any single letter, so you can dump useless letters for the cost of getting hit.
- You progress to tougher bosses as you collect letters.
- Once you defeat the final bosses and the credits, you can play endlessly.

For a SPECIAL CHALLENGE, see how many tiles you can have in your deck when you reach the end of the credits.
